1.content:
John Miller has invented an device that can change people into anything. There's just one catch, the device cant transform animals or inanimate objects, so anybody changed stays that way until the device is upgraded. what happens next is up to you.

First option: John is married, with three kids, Jessica 14, John jr 11, and Julia 8.

Second option: John has a girlfriend.

Third option: John's boss get's the device.
1.title: The device.

11.content:
John is getting ready for another day in his basement working on the final touches on his new invention. An small device, it just looks like a flash drive with a button on it.

Upstairs he can hear his wife Katie trying to get all three kids ready for school. "Come on Julia it's a cute dress." "NO." "Well what do you want to wear?" "NO! I don't want to get dressed. I don't want to go to school."

Just then John gets a idea. "If she doesn't want to go to school maybe she can stay home and help me." Forgetting that this is a one way change he heads upstairs.

"Hey Julia?" John asked, upon finding everybody in the kitchen, including Julia in her nightgown. "How would you like to help daddy today?" "YES!" "With what?" Katie asked. "With my new device. See? All you have to do is focus on who you want to change, push the button, say what you want them to be, and they'll become it."
11.title: John is married.

choices: Stay at Home to Try the Remote Out
12.content:
John was walking down to visit his girlfriend for a special date he told her about. But it isn't much of a date where they can hang out and have fun. Oh no. It's more along the lines of testing out something he created. It is a small remote device that he made that can turn anyone into anything. All he needed is to test it out and he told his girlfriend about it. Out of curiosity, she agreed to use it as a way of a date. It does depends on if the device works for not.

Going to her place, he needs to look the part. And at twenty-five, he aims to impress for this special date. He was a well built man, not body builder type, but average for someone his age. With tight pecs, six pack abs, tones biceps, and a face that is chiseled and rugged with stubble on his face, hazel eyes, and spiky black hair, he was the type of guy women could drool over. He was sporting a gray polo shirts, long blue jeans, and a pair of boots, he was dressed to impress his girlfriend in more ways then one.

Heading up to her apartment complex, he reached her door and started to knock on it.

"Coming!"

When the door opened, John's 25-year-old girlfriend, Jenny, came out and saw him standing there. Now Jenny is the kind of girl next door type of person that has fair skin, C cup breasts, curvy hips, bubble rear, and angelic face with sky blue eyes, pouty lips, thin nose, and long flowing sandy blonde hair. She was wearing a strap tank top that shows off her cleavage, tight blue jean skirt that goes down to above her knees, and a pair of three inch heal sandals. She was really ready for this date and wanted to look the part.

Looking at him, she smiled and said, "Well hello John. I was expecting you. Ready for our date I see."

John chuckled and rubbed the back of his head, saying, "Yeah... Well this has to be a special one, so I need to look like I'm ready for one. But first, I do want to show you what I am working on. May I come in?"

Amy knew that he want this to be private so she let him in.

"Sure thing. Come on in." she said.

So John started to head on inside and Jenny closed the door from behind. Once the two were in her apartment, Jenny looked to him and ask, "So... What you got there? You said you have something you've been working on that will make our date quite interesting."

John smirked and showed her. "I'm glad you ask." he said as he took something out of his pocket, "Here it is!"

Amy looked at the object he has and wasn't impressed. It look like some kind of remote with a built in computer screen and a small set of buttons that contains arrows, numbers/letter combo, and an enter sign. Looking at the screen, she was a little confused.

"Wait..." she started, "That's it! That's this special project you've been working on for quite a while. Some remote. I was expecting something a little more...exciting."

John sighed and decided to explain it to his girlfriend. "True... It looks like a remote, but it's no ordinary remote."

Jenny heard that and was curious. "Oh really...? And what is it though?"

That's when John explained to her what it is. "This remote is actually a transformative remote. Meaning it's a remote that can change anyone into whatever I like. All I have to do is choose the person or people with the scanner on the remote and then I choose what type of transformation I can use. Now the changes vary with what I can choose. Whether I age or agress them, turn them into animals, inanimate objects, or different people, change their size, switch genders, alter their race, or any other thing, the sky is the limit. Now this is just a minor prototype, but I need to test it out in the field to see if it can work before I can create more of them. So it's the reason why I want to go on this date, just to try out my new invention."

Jenny heard this and still wasn't sure if what he's saying is true, or if it's just some pipedream of his. Rubbing the back of her head, she said, "Gee... I don't know... It seems really hard to believe if that device of yours will work or not."

"Just let me give it a try. Who knows, maybe if it works, it will be a date that we will never forget when it's over." he promised.

Jenny gave it a bit of thought and wondered if it is wise using this questionable device on a date. However, this is suppose to be special, so she might as well give it a show.

"Well... Since this is our special date, might as well live a little." she said to him, "So... What should we do for today."

John heard her question and wondered too. "I don't know... I just come in here to show you the device. Why don't you make the decision on where we should go."

Jenny heard that and was surprised by that thought. So she rubbed her shin and thought about where to go. Finally, she came up with a decision and told him where to go.

"I think..."
12.title: John has a girlfriend.

121.content:
Jenny thought of where to go and wanted to try that device out. Even if what John said is true and that the remote can turn people to anything, it is quite intriguing. So after much thinking, she came up with an idea and told him.

"You know what? Why don't we just stay at home to try the device."

John heard that and was quite surprised that she wants to stay home and test the remote. "Really?" he said in confusion, "You really want to just stay in your apartment to try this beauty out. I thought for sure that you want to go out someplace. Maybe a mall, or a park, or even someplace even more romantic. A lot of people and there are a variety of choices to go by."

Jenny put her hands on her hips and said back, "True... But you said that this is a prototype, right? So what better place to test it out then in the comfort of your own home. Besides, I think it's best we try it on each other and not at anyone else until we know for sure that it's safe to try out."

John listened to her side and thought that it might work. "Hmm... You made a compelling argument." he said with interest. "All right then, let's try the device ourselves in your place. So who should go first? Me or you?"

Jenny thought of that and realized that they have to test it on each other. Whether it be her, her boyfriend, or both. The two started to think this through and wondered who will go first. So after much thinking...
121.title: Home Testing

1211.content:
Jenny thought about it and made the decision for her boyfriend.

"Well, there is an old saying in the world. 'Ladies First' So why don't you try the device on me. Might be fun to see what happens, if what you said about the device is true." she said to him.

John heard this and thought maybe it's best his girlfriend would try it out. After all, she was interested in how the device works.

"All right." he started to explain, "Whatever you say. Now first I need you to stay still. I will point the device towards you and it will scan your body. It will put down the information about you and the stats you have."

Jenny heard him and decided to hold still for the process.

"Okay then. Scan me."

John soon pointed his remote at her and begin the scanning process. An invisible scanner soon came out of antennae and went down from her head to her feet. The screen on it was showing the 'Scanning in Process' message with a loading bar going from left to right. When the scan is finished, he looked to the screen and it started to show the stats. He soon showed the stats to Jenny and said, "See, the scan is complete and your stats are present on the screen. Have a look."

Jenny approached the remote and took a good look at it. She soon saw her profile on the monitor and it showed everything about herself. It reads...

Name: Jenny Kendrick
Age: 25
Gender: Female
Race: Caucasian
IQ: 110
Language: English
Sex Drive: Medium
Height 5'6
Weight: 160 lbs.
Build: Athletic Build/C Cup/Thin Hourglass/Bubble Butt
Hair: Long/Sandy Blonde/Flowing
Eyes: Sky Blue
Occupation: College Student/Sports Athlete
Family: Mother/Father/Young Brother/Grandmother/Grandfather (Deceased)/Aunt
Love Interest: John Miller

Jenny look to the stats and was impressed by a bit. "Wow... Look at my profile. It has every known information out there. So... What happens next?"

John soon started to explain to her on the next part. "Now, I need to choose what type of transformation you will go through. As I stated before, this device has every transformation available and it depends on what I pick. But on every change, there is an option if you want to keep and change your mentality, clothes, reality and awareness. I'll leave the first three options off for now, but I'll leave the awareness on just so you can see the changes firsthand. However, if you want to switch any of those options on, please let me know and I'll do it before change."

Jenny rubbed her chin that gave that some thought. "I'll bare that in mind when we get the the changes." she said in eagerness.

John soon asked her, "So, what changes do you want?"

Jenny shrugged her shoulders and answered, "Hey! It's your device, I'll leave the choices up to you."

Hearing that, John went to the remote and turned on all the options of different transformative properties. Looking to each of them, he decided to go for...
1211.title: Jenny would go first.

1211333333.title: Even Even Even Even Even More Options

125.content: What other places does Jenny would like to go
125.title: More Locations

choices: She takes the gun and tells you to work on a new model
She gives you the gun and tells you to work on a new model
13.content:
You look down at the ray in utter joy. Your year of work at Force Labs designated only to making this and this alone. Done at last. This gun would change the world, with the ability to transform any person into anything. This was only the prototype, so no changing back however. That would be included in the next model. All the operator has to do is think of what they want, pull the trigger, and in a quick burst of light, they had themselves that thing.

You rush to your bosses office, where you knock on her door.

"Come in John!" She hollers as you immediately bust open the door. You stare at the thin 43 year old billionaire woman who owned everything in the building. She had blonde hair and bought herself DD cup tits and a butt implant to compliment her aged, beautiful face.

"May, you are not going to believe this..." You tell her as she doesn't look up from her computer screen. You set the Ray gun on her desk and say "The Device is finished." She immediately looked up at you.

"Oh my gosh, we did it." She said as she picked up the weapon. She twisted it around in her fingers before you explained to her

"Right now it can't change the people who you zap back into their normal human form, but I'm working on a model that solves that. Just imagine any object or creature, take a shot, and presto! You got yourself a former human at your fingertips." She looks at you and laughs before
13.title: John's boss get's the device.

131.content: "I'm sorry John, but I can't let anyone tattle on me before I use my new gun, and you're the only one that knows about it. I really do thank you for it." She says as your eyes light up along with the end of pistol. It glows until a bright light flashes against you, making you
131.title: She shoots you

1313.content:
Before you can react, you find your arms and legs slimming down into straps and merging together behind your back. Your chest expands to your boss' cup size, while your torso shrinks away into nothingness. You feel your now large chest becoming hollow and turning to fabric, until finally your head fades into your chest.

You find yourself nothing more than a bra. Your boss, Sandra Force, undresses herself and puts you on. "I must say, John, you're quite comfortable." she says with a grin. "Now, with you out of the way, I can go out and have fun with this thing!"

Where does Sandra go?
1313.title: A Bra

134.content: "Whitney, will you come in here real quick?" She yells out the door as you stand next to her waiting. The young Asian secretary soon entered the room, and was quite attentive to Sandra Force as she picked up the gun and squinted her eye. Whitney had a suspicious look on her face right before your boss pulled the trigger and Whitney became
134.title: She calls in her secretary

1341.content:
In the flash of an instant the former secretary of the company was zapped down from a beautiful young woman to a tiny fruit lying on the chair she once sat in. Sandra looked down at her, smiling, before plucking her up and setting her in front of you both on the desk.

"She can sense everything, but just can't talk." You told your boss as she giggled at the thought of her assistant helplessly lying there, waiting to be eaten. You are surprised as all of a sudden Sandra picks up the strawberry by the top and drops it in her mouth before devouring the former person.

In shock, you look at your boss and say "To take safety precautions, while under the effects of the Ray, the subject can not die, so she's going to be fully aware throughout her trip in your digestive system!" You frantically walk around the office, wondering what to do as Sandra unleashes a massive burp.

"Now John, we wouldn't want anyone hearing about this now would we?" She tells you in a threatening way.

"Well no mam, I guess not..." You reply hesitantly.

"Well
1341.title: A Strawberry

13412.content: "The power in this gun has the capabilities to make us both into gods!" She exclaims to you in an excited manner. "Think about it! If I use the gun to give us both unlimited power, we don't even need the gun!" She leant in and hugged you before smacking a kiss right on your lips. "John, I love you and I want to rule the world with you. What do you say?" She looks at you with a sincere face as you look back and say
13412.title: "I think we could rule together"

info.brief_description: You have an device that can change anyone into anything. But there's a catch.
info.description: John Miller has invented an device that can change people into anything. There's just one catch, the device cant transform animals or inanimate objects, so anybody changed stays that way until the device is upgraded. what happens next is up to you.
